title: ICT Utilization and Learning Achievement Improvement Strategies: PISA Data-Based Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: College-level mathematics foundation and basic ICT proficiency
context.additional_context: Analysis of the impact of ICT utilization strategies on mathematics learning outcomes in smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze correlations between ICT utilization levels and math performance using PISA data
Learners can explain the moderating effect of national ICT infrastructure levels on individual learning outcomes
Learners can design and propose effective math learning strategies in smartphone environments through project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
